summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transaction details for a Deutsche Bank account from October 1, 2015, to October 31, 2015. It includes information on deposits, checks paid, service charges, and other financial activities during the month.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is mentioned as a contact for personal assistance regarding the account.

keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $199,255.11 on October 1, 2015.
Total deposits and other credits during the month amounted to $489.16.
The account experienced checks paid totaling $14,443.63.
Service charges for the statement period were $50.00.
The ending balance as of October 31, 2015, was $129,086.45.
